title: sAma gAna
sahitya:
sAma gAna sArva bhauma svAmi tyAgarAja nAma


anupallavi

  I mahimalO nI krtulanu mEmantA pADi pADi 
pEru dhanamu kIrti padma gauravamula nandEnu


caraNam    tAmE peddalaTa sampradAya samsiddhulaTa 
shrIman muraLI gAnamu rasika janulu mecca rAdaTa 
EmEmO palumATalu nErcciri gAyakulu nEDu 
nI mahima jUpi sat-sangItamu samrakSimpumu
